long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add and see commentary about your favorite movies and shows.In addition to Murmur commentary, this extension shows cast, songs, and iMDB trivia. Check out the Murmur website for more.

Permissions required:
- "Read and change all your data on all websites": Murmur only tracks your activity on Netflix.com and Hulu.com. When users create posts, the extension takes a screenshot to record what’s happening at that time Google’s requires <all_urls> permission to take a screenshot.
- "Know your email address": By having your email address, we’re able to save your Watch History and commentary.You can always "view the source" to see Murmur’s code. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us.
